ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Shipment_Finished__c = true && Service_Rate_Category__c = "Road Freights" && $User.ProfileId <> "2F00e4T000000lKYP" || Shipment_Finished__c = true && Service_Rate_Category__c = "Sea Freights" && $User.ProfileId <> "2F00e4T000000lKYP" || Shipment_Finished__c = true && Service_Rate_Category__c = "Air Freights" && $User.ProfileId <> "2F00e4T000000lKYP"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: NO SE PUEDE MODIFICAR EN ESTATUS FINISHED
